definition: (med) retractile testicle/infatuation inducing/pee inducing (of alcohol)/(neologism) to be sexually attracted/to have the hots for sb
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
to take care/to be mindful/(Internet slang) to be moved by sth/poignant/to have deep feelings for sb/to lose one's heart to sb

(slang) to engage in male homosexual practices
to open fire with artillery/to set off firecrackers/to make one's stage debut/(slang) to have sex/to masturbate
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
to court/to go steady/to be dating
